name: Endless Runner (Simple Gaming - Daniel M)
description:
Endless Runner

Is a simple game with infinity randomly generated levels with difficulty incrase! 
In game you must avoid obstacles, kill or avoid enemies and collect gold coins.

They are 3 types of enemies:
First enemy is a simple...

  - Mouse

Second popular enemy is...

 - Slime

Last enemy is lovely spider, this enemy can move so be careful!

 - Spider

 Of course you can kill this enemies with most popular way. Just jump on it and will be dead soon. For killing enemies you can get extra points but you can die too. Is only one live in one run, if you die you must start from beginning.

Game level are randomly generated but the difficulty is incrase with your progress.

They are 4 difficulty in game: 

  EASY/NORMAL

 MEDIUM          

  HARD                

      INSANE                

So prepare your spacebar and let's play the game! 

Remember, if you can beat some moments in game. Everything is about good timing. Have fun!

If you like game please leave comment and rate game! 
Enjoy!

Knowed bugs:

-Missing respawn collider in two first gaps

-No exit button (only Alf+F4), this should be live build without exit button but unsuccesfully some error just forced me to build PC version (no time left)
